message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $16,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $16,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $10,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $14,000. This product is truly top-of-the-line and I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $14,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to go up to $12,000, but that's as high as I can go. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
